statements: UPDATE real_estate_properties SET estimated_rent = 1500.00 WHERE property_id = 12345;

UPDATE real_estate_properties SET purchase_price = 250000, current_value = 280000 WHERE property_id = 101
UPDATE real_estate_properties SET address = '123 Oak Street', city = 'San Francisco' WHERE property_id = 102
UPDATE property SET purchase_price = 120000.00, current_value = 125000.00 WHERE property_id = 101;
UPDATE financial_report SET expenses = 5000.00, profit = revenue - 5000.00 WHERE property_id = 103 AND report_date = '2022-08-15';
UPDATE property SET current_value = current_value * 1.1 WHERE property_id = 101;
UPDATE financial_report SET profit = revenue - expenses WHERE report_date = '2022-10-15';
UPDATE investment_properties SET purchase_price = 250000, owner_name = 'John Doe' WHERE property_id = 1;
UPDATE financial_reports SET net_profit = 1500.75, expenses = 500.25 WHERE report_id = 3;
UPDATE investment_properties SET market_value = 250000, owner_name = 'John Doe' WHERE property_id = 123;
UPDATE financial_reports SET revenue = 10000, expenses = 5000, net_profit = 5000 WHERE property_id = 123 AND report_date = '2022-10-01';
UPDATE properties SET purchase_price = 500000 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 10000, transaction_type = 'Rent' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE properties SET purchase_price = 120000.00, market_value = 140000.00 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 5000.00, transaction_date = '2022-03-15' WHERE property_id = 3;
